sources: /media/abhishek/Partition 4/Courses/2.react/1React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)/practise/pokedex/src/components/Pokecards/Pokecard/Pokecard.js
sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import styles from './Pokecard.module.css'; class Pokecard extends Component { state = { frontStyles: '', backStyles: styles.back, } changeClass = () => { this.setState({ frontStyles: styles.frontStyles, backStyles: styles.backStyles }) setTimeout(() => { this.song.play() }, 400); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ frontStyles: '', backStyles: styles.back }) }, 1000); } shouldComponentUpdate(nextState, nextProps) { return this.state !== nextState || this.props !== nextProps } render() { let cardbg = ''; //Fire Classes if (this.props.abilities === 'Fire' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Rock' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Fighting' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Psychic Fire' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Normal' || this.props.abilities === 'Bug Fire') { cardbg = styles.fire } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Dark Fire' || this.props.abilities === 'Ghost Fire' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Fire Dark') { cardbg = styles.darkFire } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Fire Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Dragon Fire') { cardbg = styles.fireDragon } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Poison Fire') { cardbg = styles.poisonFire } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Fire Water') { cardbg = styles.fireWater } //Grass Classes else if (this.props.abilities === 'Grass' || this.props.abilities === 'Grass Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Bug Grass' || this.props.abilities === 'Grass Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Grass Fighting' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Grass' || this.props.abilities === 'Grass Fairy' || this.props.abilities === 'Normal Grass' ) { cardbg = styles.grass } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Grass Poison' || this.props.abilities === 'Grass Dark') { cardbg = styles.grassPoison } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Grass Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Psychic Grass') { cardbg = styles.psyGrass } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Poison' || this.props.abilities === 'Bug Poison' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Poison' || this.props.abilities === 'Poison Water' || this.props.abilities === 'Poison Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Poison Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Poison Fighting' || this.props.abilities === 'Poison Bug' || this.props.abilities === 'Poison Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Poison') { cardbg = styles.poison } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Water' || this.props.abilities === 'Normal Water' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Fighting' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Water' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Fairy' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Rock' || this.props.abilities === 'Bug Water' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Bug' ) { cardbg = styles.water } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Bug'|| this.props.abilities === 'Bug Ground'|| this.props.abilities === 'Bug Fighting'|| this.props.abilities === 'Bug Fairy'|| this.props.abilities === 'Bug Flying') { cardbg = styles.normal } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Ice' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Ice' || this.props.abilities === 'Ice Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Fighting Ice' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Ice' || this.props.abilities === 'Dragon Ice' || this.props.abilities === 'Dark Ice' || this.props.abilities === 'Grass Ice' || this.props.abilities === 'Ice Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Ice Water') { cardbg = styles.ice } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Electric' || this.props.abilities === 'Ground Electric' || this.props.abilities === 'Bug Electric' || this.props.abilities === 'Electric Fairy' || this.props.abilities === 'Electric Normal' || this.props.abilities === 'Dragon Electric' || this.props.abilities === 'Electric Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Electric Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Electric') { cardbg = styles.electric } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Normal Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Ground Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Ground Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Dragon Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Ground Rock'|| this.props.abilities === 'Bug Rock'|| this.props.abilities === 'Rock Fairy'|| this.props.abilities === 'Rock Fighting'|| this.props.abilities === 'Rock Bug') { cardbg = styles.ground } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Normal' || this.props.abilities === 'Normal Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Normal Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Flying Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Dragon Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Normal Fairy'|| this.props.abilities === 'Fairy'|| this.props.abilities === 'Fairy Flying'|| this.props.abilities === 'Fighting Flying'|| this.props.abilities === 'Flying'|| this.props.abilities === 'Dragon'|| this.props.abilities === 'Dragon Fighting'|| this.props.abilities === 'Normal Fighting'|| this.props.abilities === 'Fighting') { cardbg = styles.normal } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Water Grass') { cardbg = styles.waterGrass } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Dark' || this.props.abilities === 'Ghost Dark' || this.props.abilities === 'Dark Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Fighting Dark' || this.props.abilities === 'Dark Fighting' || this.props.abilities === 'Ground Dark' || this.props.abilities === 'Dark Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Dark Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Dark' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Dark' ) { cardbg = styles.dark } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Psychic Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Electric Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Steel Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Ice Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Bug Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Fighting Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Ground Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Ghost Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Ghost Fairy' || this.props.abilities === 'Ghost Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Ghost Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Ghost Grass' || this.props.abilities === 'Grass Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Ghost' || this.props.abilities === 'Ghost Poison' || this.props.abilities === 'Poison Dark') { cardbg = styles.ghost } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Dark Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Rock Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Steel Rock' || this.props.abilities === 'Steel Fighting' || this.props.abilities === 'Fighting Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Steel Ground' || this.props.abilities === 'Ground Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Bug Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Steel Fairy' || this.props.abilities === 'Steel Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Steel Dragon' || this.props.abilities === 'Grass Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Water Steel' ) { cardbg = styles.steel } else if (this.props.abilities === 'Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Steel Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Psychic Steel' || this.props.abilities === 'Psychic Fighting' || this.props.abilities === 'Fighting Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Ground Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Normal Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Psychic Flying' || this.props.abilities === 'Dragon Psychic' || this.props.abilities === 'Psychic Fairy' ) { cardbg = styles.psychic } let soundSrc if(this.props.id){ soundSrc = '/sounds/' + this.props.id.slice(1, 4) + '.wav' if(this.props.id.slice(1,2)==='0'){ soundSrc = '/sounds/' + this.props.id.slice(2, 4) + '.wav' if(this.props.id.slice(1,3)==='00'){ soundSrc='/sounds/' + this.props.id.slice(3, 4) + '.wav' } } } return (
this.changeClass(this.props.id)} >

{this.props.id}

{this.props.name}

{this.props.abilities}

); } } export default Pokecard
